content.title: Descriptive | Poem
content.instructions: Drag the proofreading marks to identify the errors. Type misspelled or missing words.
content.text:
Mary's Lamb By Sarah Josepha {u}hale Mary had a little {l}Lamb.
Its fleece was white {+|as} snow.
And everywhere that Mary went,
The lamb was sure to go. He followed her to school one day,
Which was against the {-|the} rule.
{u}it made the children laugh and play
To see a lamb at school.
